title: Godot Engine Official
description: Godot is a 2D and 3D free and open source game engine developed by a community of contributors. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

items.title: GodotCon Amsterdam - Save the date!
items.description: Want to join? Amsterdam 23-24 of April. Get your tickets now! (Call for speakers and sponsors open)
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: Maintenance release: Godot 4.6.1
items.description: The first 4.6 maintenance release has arrived!

items.title: Godot 4.6 – All about your flow
items.description: With the stability gained over the past five releases, the engine has matured enough to enter a new phase. Godot 4.6 kicks off a period of polish, quality-of-life improvements, and doubled-down effort on performance optimization.
items.dc:creator: Godot contributors

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.5.2 RC 1
items.description: While Godot 4.6 is just around the corner, we provide a number of important bug fixes for 4.5 users in a new 4.5.2 maintenance release, now in RC stage.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Maintenance release: Godot 3.6.2
items.description: Although we fixed many of the major 3.6 bugs in Godot 3.6.1 in June, we have decided to make a new 3.6 point release in order to keep up to date with platform requirements.
